members.name: Ariel Alexi
members.title: PhD. Student
members.description: Ariel done her Master degree at Bar Ilan University, Information Science department, under the joint supervision of Prof. Ariel Rosenfeld and mine. Ariel's research is focusing on optimal resource allocation for clinical care in a heterogeneous population during a pandemic as well as scientometrics.

members.name: Dr. Assaf Shmuel
members.title: PhD. Student
members.description: Assaf is a PhD Student in Bar Ilan University, CS department, under the joint supervision of Dr. Oren Glickman and mine. Assaf's research focuses on integrating symbolic regression into machine and deep learning models to obtain accurate and explainable data-driven models. An additional part of his research focuses on generalization and out-of-distribution prediction in machine and deep learning.

members.name: Naor Matania
members.title: Research assistance
members.description: Naor lead the RnD development of a machine learning model of clinical data obtained from Clalit. He was responsible for the data preparation, model development, model analysis, and results report and visualization.

members.name: Liron Simon-Keren
members.title: MS. Student
members.description: Liron, an honored M.Sc. graduate in Mechanical Engineering from Tel Aviv University, conducted research on symbolic regression frameworks with knowledge integration. She applied them to generate predictive correlations in fluid dynamics under the joint supervision of Prof. Alex Liberzon andÂ myself.

members.name: Yonatan Herskowitz
members.title: MS. Student
members.description: Yonatan was a MS Student in Ariel University, Mathematical department, under the supervision of Prof. Svetlana Bunimovich-Mendrazitsky and mine. Yonatan's research focused on pandemic spread modeling for coffee tree and its control using biological agents.

members.name: Liel Mushiev
members.title: Research assistance
members.description: Liel participent in a study that proposed a novel scientometrics metric using big data analysis of researcher with a focus on the mathematical domain.

members.name: Tzach Fleischer
members.title: Research assistance
members.description: Tzach participent in a study entitled 'Benchmarking biologically-inspired automatic machine learning for economic tasks'. He was responsible for the data curation, prepration, and running the experiments.
